Adverse Events by System Organ Class and Preferred Term

t_ae.Rd

t_ae returns adverse events summary table that corresponds to STREAM template AET02

t_ae(terms_all, id, col_by, col_N, total = "All Patients")

Arguments

terms_all

term information as character or factor dataframe, however factor levels are not repeated by class, only terms with count > 1 are listed per class. Currently terms_all can only be a dataframe with 2 columns. var_relabel is used as the character string used as a label in the column header for each term.
id

unique subject identifier. If a particular subject has no adverse event then that information needs to be added to the col_N argument.
col_by

group variable that will be used for a column header. col_by has to be a factor and can not be missing. See 'Examples'.
col_N

numeric vector with information of the number of patients in the levels of col_by. This is useful if there are patients that have no adverse events can be accounted for with this argument.
total

character string that will be used as a label for a column with pooled total population, default is "All Patients". If the levels of col_by are the only columns of interest then total should be NULL

Value

rtable object

Details

This is an equivalent of the STREAM output %stream_t_summary(templates = aet02) (http://bioportal.roche.com/stream_doc/2_05/um/report_outputs_aet02.html)

This is an equivalent of the STREAM 1.17 output %stream_t_events_basic(templates = aet02) (https://rochewiki.roche.com/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=294027342)

Examples

# Simple example
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)

ASL <- tibble(
  USUBJID = paste0("id-", 1:10),
  ARM = factor(paste("ARM", LETTERS[rep(c(1,2), c(3,7))]))
)


ae_lookup <- tribble(
  ~CLASS,         ~TERM,   ~GRADE,
  "cl A",   "trm A_1/2",        1,
  "cl A",   "trm A_2/2",        2,
  "cl B",   "trm B_1/3",        2,
  "cl B",   "trm B_2/3",        3,
  "cl B",   "trm B_3/3",        1,
  "cl C",   "trm C_1/1",        1
)

AAE <- cbind(
  tibble(
    USUBJID = ASL$USUBJID[c(2,2,2,3,3,4,4,4,4,5,6,6,7,7)]
  ),
  ae_lookup[c(1,1,2,6,4,2,2,3,4,2,1,5,4,6),]
)

ANL <- left_join(AAE, ASL, by = "USUBJID")

terms_all <- data.frame(class = ANL$CLASS, term = ANL$TERM, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
var_labels(terms_all) <- c('MedDRA System Organ Class', 'MedDRA Preferred Term')

tbl <- t_ae(
  terms_all = terms_all,
  id = ANL$USUBJID,
  col_by = ANL$ARM,
  col_N = tapply(ASL$ARM, ASL$ARM, length),
  total = "All Patients"
)

tbl
#> MedDRA System Organ Class                                                    ARM A               ARM B            All Patients
#>   MedDRA Preferred Term                                                      (N=3)               (N=7)               (N=10)   
#> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> - Any Adverse Event -
#>   Overall total number of events                                               5                   9                   14     
#>   Overall total number of patients with at least one adverse event         2 (66.67%)          4 (57.14%)           6 (60%)   
#> 
#> cl A
#>   Total number of events                                                       3                   4                   7      
#>   Total number of patients with at least one adverse event                 1 (33.33%)          3 (42.86%)           4 (40%)   
#>   trm A_2/2                                                                1 (33.33%)          2 (28.57%)           3 (30%)   
#>   trm A_1/2                                                                1 (33.33%)          1 (14.29%)           2 (20%)   
#> 
#> cl B
#>   Total number of events                                                       1                   4                   5      
#>   Total number of patients with at least one adverse event                 1 (33.33%)          3 (42.86%)           4 (40%)   
#>   trm B_2/3                                                                1 (33.33%)          2 (28.57%)           3 (30%)   
#>   trm B_1/3                                                                  0 (0%)            1 (14.29%)           1 (10%)   
#>   trm B_3/3                                                                  0 (0%)            1 (14.29%)           1 (10%)   
#> 
#> cl C
#>   Total number of events                                                       1                   1                   2      
#>   Total number of patients with at least one adverse event                 1 (33.33%)          1 (14.29%)           2 (20%)   
#>   trm C_1/1                                                                1 (33.33%)          1 (14.29%)           2 (20%)   

# Example using dummy data
library(random.cdisc.data)
library(dplyr)

ASL <- radam("ASL", N = 10)
AAE <- radam("AAE", ADSL = ASL)

ANL <- left_join(AAE, ASL %>% select(USUBJID, STUDYID, ARM), by = c("STUDYID", "USUBJID"))

terms_all <- data.frame(class = ANL$AEBODSYS, term = ANL$AEDECOD, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
var_labels(terms_all) <- c('MedDRA System Organ Class', 'MedDRA Preferred Term')

tbl <- t_ae(terms_all = terms_all,
            id = ANL$USUBJID,
            col_by = factor(ANL$ARM),
            total = "All Patients"
            )

tbl
